pullRequest.title: enable jackson after-burner module as based on jackson recommendation…
pullRequest.bodyText:
Enabling jackson after-burner module as per jackson perf recommendation guideline.
As per my testing it has perf benefit (10%-20%) improvement in serialization/deserialization of Pojo objects.
deserializationFromByteArrayAfterBurner            thrpt    5   8123970.225 ± 1496152.618  ops/s
deserializationFromByteArrayBasic                  thrpt    5   7134350.613 ±  430038.968  ops/s
deserializationFromStringAfterBurner               thrpt    5   7721590.991 ±  478483.561  ops/s
deserializationFromStringBasic                     thrpt    5   5975860.845 ±  327424.425  ops/s
deserializationToJsonNodeFromByteArrayAfterBurner  thrpt    5   6697463.566 ±  366122.243  ops/s
deserializationToJsonNodeFromByteArrayBasic        thrpt    5   6638768.458 ±  200262.241  ops/s
deserializationToJsonNodeFromStringAfterBurner     thrpt    5   5667078.945 ±  698318.558  ops/s
deserializationToJsonNodeFromStringBasic           thrpt    5   5867745.040 ±  683809.115  ops/s
serializationJsonNodeToByteBufferAfterBurner       thrpt    5   9134217.659 ±  207571.785  ops/s
serializationJsonNodeToByteBufferBasic             thrpt    5   8933293.546 ±  543105.447  ops/s
serializationToByteArrayAfterBurner                thrpt    5  12375378.032 ±  779990.684  ops/s
serializationToByteArrayBasic                      thrpt    5  11802039.296 ± 1268299.370  ops/s
serializationToByteBufferAfterBurner               thrpt    5  12753187.458 ±  713562.057  ops/s
serializationToByteBufferBasic                     thrpt    5  11667844.011 ±  732413.820  ops/s
serializationToStringToByteArrayAfterBurner        thrpt    5   9329222.739 ±  350415.943  ops/s
serializationToStringToByteArrayStringBasic        thrpt    5   8890755.570 ±  925089.306  ops/s

commit.message: enable jackson after-burner module as based on jackson recommendation it has perf benefit (10%-20%) improvement in serialization/deserialization

nodes.bodyText:
Though its not related to your PR, but I am wondering, why do we have separate ObjectMapper instance here ?
Why don't we use the one from Utils.java ?
Reason for asking this question is, we don't register objectMapper with all the modules here.
